title: Howdy boys I made a game
body:
Yeah so I made this ages ago, it's a Kled based game. 
https://i.imgur.com/ilgv7jk.png - Proof
Upload is here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LZJzb2kBueXzOndqEhgDSTrF05GaOQ8f/view?usp=sharing

To play:
A and D to move left/right
W to jump, S to duck while dismounted from skaarl (ducking dodges arrows)
Space to attack
E while mounted to get invulnerable frames and dash
Q while dismounted to shoot gun. 
Killing 20 enemies while dismounted calls skaarl back.
Attack the flags
Yeah she's unfinished as but it's playable, don't think I'll figure it'd ever get out so just putting it here for some fellas to play I guess. 
Not a virus, I swear.

replies.body:
https://www.riotgames.com/en/legal

>**1. What can I develop with Riot’s IP?**

>TL;DR - Cool free stuff for the community to enjoy, with some exceptions
>
By formal decree of the Demacian High Court (our legal team): on the condition that you follow all of the rules described in this policy (the “Rules”) and the Terms of Use, Riot Games (“Riot” or “We”) grants you a personal, non-exclusive, non-sublicenseable, non-transferable, revocable, limited license for you to use, display and create derivative works based upon Riot’s IP, strictly for noncommercial (except as specifically provided below) community use.
yeah mate already looked at this stuff brother, it's even on a google drive so there's no $$$ being made here, aka very cool with riot.

I admire your dedication brah, I gave up after trying to render a silly red triangle on black screen with OpenGL lol.

You get an up vote from me :D
